pr_title: [Bugfix] Fix NPE for automatic feedback as the build can fail

timeline.message: fix npe when build failed for a student submission

timeline.bodyText: does this really work? I guess you would need to leave out the ! operator after feedbacks
timeline.author: krusche

replies.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: you are right, this is not needed and can be removed. Good catch! 👍
replies.author: fde312

replies.bodyText: I think it still works but removing the ! is cleaner.
replies.author: kloessst
